name: Babka On The Hunt Light
description:
Babka On The Hunt is a 2D platform game with interesting locations from Russia. Travel all the time. Gather berries and beware of any danger.

In this game you will travel to different locations, from the city hospital to Chernobyl with Pavlovsky Posad

Help grandma go through all the locations. Jump on platforms and solve easy tasks

WAITING FOR YOU:

- Dynamic and convenient joystick and button control

- Optimization for different mobile devices

- Completely individual and original storyline

- Interesting locations from Russia. Hospital, Chernobyl, Pavlovsky Posad

- Distribution of grandmother on different services, from Google Play to your YouTube channel and website

COMING SOON:

- Very high-quality implementation of the hunt, with full influence on the plot and further continuation

- Your own soundtrack, perfect for the game

- Development of locations

- All possible ways to engage the user in the gameplay, from the dialogue system to the plot

And much, much more.... Download the game right now! Plunge into the world of 2d platformer. Help grandma go through all the locations. Let's start traveling now!
